alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Lee; Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 7:03AM EDT until July 28 at 7:45AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is ongoing. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, Breathitt, Lee, Magoffin and Owsley. * WHEN...Until 1215 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 658 AM EDT, Flooding persists due to heavy rain that fell during the late night and early morning hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Jackson, Beattyville, Booneville, Simpson, Fivemile, Frozen Creek, Keck, Elkatawa, Sewell, Inverness, Vancleve, Gentry, Noctor, Dumont, Wilhurst, Quicksand, Lawson, Yeadon, Taulbee and Portsmouth.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
